Home » 40P10 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
4 Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
14.
37Nakusalaṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nakusalaṃ naasaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
38Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa…pe…  vipāke nava…pe…  avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
15.
39Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
40Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa…pe…  vipāke nava…pe…  avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
16.
41Nakusalaṃ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
42Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa…pe…  vipāke nava…pe…  avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
17.
43Nakusalaṃ naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
44Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava.
18.
45Nakusalaṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
46Hetuyā catuvīsa…pe…  vipāke nava…pe…  avigate catuvīsa.
19.
47Nakusalaṃ naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
48Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava.
20.
49Nakusalaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
50Hetuyā sattarasa…pe…  āsevane nava…pe…  vipāke nava…pe…  avigate sattarasa.
21.
51Nakusalaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
52Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa…pe…  vipāke nava…pe…  avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
22.
53Nakusalaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nakusalaṃ nanakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
54Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa…pe…  vipāke nava…pe…  avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
